    • Constructor Detail

      • AdRequestConfiguration

        public AdRequestConfiguration(java.lang.String serverURL,
                              java.lang.String playerProfile)
        Create an ad request configuration.
        Parameters:
        serverURL - URL of the FreeWheel Ad Server which should consist of the protocol and the host, like http://g1.v.fwmrm.net
        playerProfile - name of the player profile

    • Method Detail

      • getServerURL

        public java.lang.String getServerURL()
        Get the ad server URL.
        Returns:
        the FreeWheel ad server URL

      • setServerURL

        public void setServerURL(java.lang.String serverURL)
        Set the ad server URL.
        Parameters:
        serverURL - URL of the FreeWheel Ad Server which should consist of the protocol and the host, like http://g1.v.fwmrm.net.

      • getAdRequestMode

        public IConstants.RequestMode getAdRequestMode()
        Get the ad request mode
        Returns:
        the request mode setup on the configuration. Please note, the default value is RequestMode.ON_DEMAND

      • setAdRequestMode

        public void setAdRequestMode(IConstants.RequestMode requestMode)
        Set the mode of the ad request

        AdManager runs in ON_DEMAND mode by default. To switch to live mode by invocation of this method right after getting a new AdContext instance.

        Parameters:
        requestMode - the type of request mode

      • setSubsessionToken

        public void setSubsessionToken(int subsessionToken)
        Set the subsession token. By default if this method is not called by the app, a random number is generated as subsession token when the request mode is live.
        Parameters:
        subsessionToken - the subsession token (greater than 0) that uniquely identifies a subsession

      • getSubsessionToken

        public int getSubsessionToken()
        Return the subsession token that will be used by the current ad request. Note that it only works when the request mode is live.
        Returns:
        the subsession token
